text:
(B1 CITY SUPER、大食代、NESPRESSO、2F Massimo Dutti、5F海底撈、10F威秀影城除外)
2、請出示發票+銷貨明細表(載具明細表)。 截圖、翻拍恕不配合停車折抵優惠
3、單張發票限折抵一台汽車(大型主題餐廳除外)。
4、汽車每日每車含信用卡/貴賓卡/威秀票根/兒童卡/消費發票，最高折抵4小時。
5、當日消費發票限當日使用
6、折抵地點：B3停車管理室、B1服務中心、1F服務台、7F客服中心、停車場繳費機
trans:
(B1 CITY SUPER, Food Court, NESPRESSO, 2F Massimo Dutti, 5F Haidilao, and 10F Vieshow Cinemas excluded)
2. Please present the receipt + detailed sales list (or carrier details). Screenshots or photos will not be accepted for parking discount privileges.
3. Each receipt can only be used to offset parking for one car (excluding large themed restaurants).
4. For cars, each vehicle per day with a credit card/privilege card/Vieshow ticket stub/children's card/consumption receipt can offset parking fees for up to 4 hours.
5. Parking receipt discounts must be used on the same day of purchase.
6. Discount locations: B3 Parking Management Office, B1 Service Center, 1F Service Desk, 7F Customer Service Center, Parking Payment Machines.
